name: Laser Locked
description:
You must fight against waves of enemies by blasting  and obliterating them with lasers. Test your co-ordination and reflexes in this frantic run and gun game.

Credits:

music: Boss Fight - Commando Steve

Made By Jada and Moli

Controls:

Press Tab for a laser that will give you a bigger score | Orange boi: WASD  | Blue boi : arrow keys | LFM to shoot(orange)|F  to shoot(blu) | Please rate the game
